author: Jennifer Knightstep
title: 19 Things You Should Never âď¸ Apologize đđź for as a Woman đŠđżđŠđ˝đŠđźđŠđťâŚ
text:
19 Things You Should Never âď¸ Apologize đđź for as a Woman đŠđżđŠđ˝đŠđźđŠđť ... 
Why do we feel it's so necessary to apologize for so many things in life? 
I mean, sure, there are plenty of things that you should apologize for if and when you do them, but there's a long list of #things we should all stop saying "sorry" for, starting right. 
NOW. 
You don't owe anyone your time or attention. 
Don't apologize for not being interested.
